BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application no. 20115507 SCQ, a proposed site for a new, approximately 416 seat Primary School Facilities, P.S. 316 (Block 9063, Lot 27 and Block 9064, Lots 31 and 35), Council District No. 32, Borough of Queens. This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, 416 seat Primary School Facilities, P.S. 316, Queens (20115507 SCQ)
